title: art nouveau typeface and script
author: chrisdigital

comments.content:
It's Renaissant from Dickinson Type Foundry, which actually predates the Art Nouveau period...

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/renaissant-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417030044/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/renaissant-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/renaissant-nf/")
Campanile (Regular) from Dan X Solo for Cameo Frame

bojev called it! [http://www.dafont.com/campanile.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417030044/http:/www.dafont.com/campanile.font "http://www.dafont.com/campanile.font") Well played. Well played.

Just cross-pollinating in case others want background on this typeface... more info here: [http://www.typophile.com/node/116617](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417030044/http:/www.typophile.com/node/116617 "http://www.typophile.com/node/116617")
